post: Very nice presentation. Knowledgeable, in depth yet succinct, professional. I was disappointed that after using phrases like” mind boggling” and” astronomically low odds” he meticulously avoids saying” yes” as to the origin, to the One represented. That reminded me of the old hymn “Almost Persuaded” ..
title: Thomas De Wesselow On Why the Image is Unlikely by an Artist
